content: incredible expanding gnome cap a tiny cap worked in the round from the brim up with a yarn-over cable motif cables are ribbing and the cables in this wee hat will expand as your tiny infant grows all proceeds from the sale of the incredible expanding preemie cap benefit march of dimes supporting research in premature birth prevention materials wool 2 dye for cash sock wool2dye4 com maureen hefti is a knitwear designer living in sacramento ca she knits with many 80% merino wool 10% cashmere 10% nylon groups including leading free monthly knitting lessons at her local branch library 435 yards 398 meters /100 grams 3 53 ounces maureen believes in volunteerism and charity but is not at all a saint not even close this hat takes 1/5 skein or about 80 yards feel she hopes to cut down on swearing and raucous laughter but she knows this isn t likely free to substitute your favorite sport or sock yarn ravenousknits com needle size 1 2 5mm circ or dpns incredible expanding gnome cap 1 using the cable cast on method co 100 st 2 if using dpns arrange 25 st per needle on the first and second needles and 50 st on the third needle if using magic loop on a long circ arrange 50 st on each half and pm 3 join for working in the round 4 work ribbing to set up for yo cable *p2 k3 * on this and every round repeat btwn * to end continue in rib pat next four rounds begin yo cable gauge round 1 *p2 s1 k2 psso * 25 st and 49 row/4 inches when round 2 *p2 k1 yo k1 * stretched over a 16 inch sphere round 3 *p2 k3 * 46 st and 44 row/ 4 inches gen- round 4 same as round 3 tly blocked and measured when repeat rounds 1-4 twelve times ~4 inches fabric has completely relaxed round 5 same as round 1 round 6 same as round 2 begin decrease rounds round 7 * p2 k3 2x p2 s2 k1 psso p2 k3 2x * 92 st round 8 * p2 k3 2x p2 k1 p2 k3 2x * round 9 * p2 s1 k2 psso 2x p1 s2 k1 psso p1 s1 k2 psso p2 s1 k2 psso * round 10 * p2 k1 yo k1 2x p1 k1 p1 k1 yo k1 p2 k1 yo k1 * 84 st round 11 *
